overview.heading: What is Consul?
overview.body: Consul uses service identities and traditional networking practices to help organizations securely connect applications running in any environment.

get_started.heading: Getting Started
get_started.body: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

cards.heading: Discover Services
cards.body: Create a central registry that tracks services, updates, and health statuses in real time.

cards.heading: Secure Networking
cards.body: Ensure all service to service communication is authenticated, authorized, and encrypted.

cards.heading: Automate Networking
cards.body: Reduce the operator burden by automating key networking tasks.

cards.heading: Access Services
cards.body: Control access to services at the point of entry and centralize traffic management.
